name: Ballin-avenger
body:
# ballin-avenger jQuery Accordion
==============
This is a simple accordion that I have created using the jquery ui. Feel free to make suggestions on modifying or enhancing. This accordion is fluid and will fill whatever container you have it placed it.

A live example can be view at [http://vozpc.com/accordion.html](http://vozpc.com/accordion.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
